name: Jestware Games
description:
Jestware Games!

(Dk) Du skal være en gambler under det hårde liv, hvor du ingen penge har. Det er op til dig at blive til et sigma male, ved hjælp af gambling. Se, analysere, hør og BET! Hvis det hele går galt, kan man altid tage en kvik lån.

(En) You are a gambler during the hard life where you have no money. It's up to you to become a sigma male, by gambling. Watch, analyze, listen and BET! If everything goes wrong, you can always take out a quick loan.
